title: ASU - Nick Carroll

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any signed and/or executed employment contract/agreement/offer letter/memorandum of understanding between Arkansas State University and Nick Carroll.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Ellen.

title: Records retention schedule (Bureau of Prisons)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all materials, indices, directives, manuals, and other guiding documentation regarding records generated and retained, including but not limited to: 

• Record retention schedules
• Any other data structures used for the management of records: digital, paper, and otherwise

I request that you release records for this request on a rolling basis as they become available and in electronic form. If your agency does not maintain these public records, please let me know who does and include the proper custodian's name and address. If you choose to deny this request, please provide a written explanation for the denial including a reference to the specific statutory exemption(s) upon which you rely. Also, please provide all segregable portions of otherwise exempt material.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. 

Sincerely,

Dillon Bergin

title: Guides, policies and trainings on electronic federal records (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All guides, memos or briefings on storing and handling electronic records, including but not limited to text messages, as federal records. 

- All polices on storing and handling electronic records, including but not limited to text messages, as federal records. 

-  All employee training materials on storing and handling electronic records, including but not limited to text messages, as federal records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dillon Bergin
